title: Ivey High School Case Competition (IHSCC)
description: A prestigious high school case competition hosted by Ivey Business School, challenging students to solve real-world business problems.
registrationOpens: Typically in winter; accepted applicants for 2025 were notified in March.

title: Junior Economic Club of Canada – Canadian Business Competition (JCBC)
description: A national business competition that challenges Canadian high school students to demonstrate their business acumen and entrepreneurial skills.
registrationOpens: Not explicitly stated; for 2025, deadline was March 1, 2025 at 11:59 PM EST.

title: University of Toronto SRI High School Case Competition (UTSRI HSCC)
organizer: University of Toronto Student Research Initiative
description: A case competition organized by the University of Toronto Student Research Initiative, providing high school students with real-world business challenges.
registrationOpens: Registration is officially OPEN per Instagram; no exact open date mentioned.

title: DECA Ontario
description: DECA prepares emerging leaders and entrepreneurs for careers in marketing, finance, hospitality and management through competitive events and leadership opportunities.

title: Future Business Leaders of Canada (FBLC)
description: Future Business Leaders of Canada provides opportunities for students to develop business and leadership skills through competitive events and conferences.

title: Blue Ocean Student Entrepreneur Competition
description: A global student entrepreneur competition that encourages innovative business ideas and entrepreneurial thinking among students worldwide.

title: Diamond Challenge
description: An international high school entrepreneurship competition that challenges students to develop innovative business concepts and social ventures.

title: Rotman Commerce Case Competition
description: The Boardroom case competition hosted by Rotman Commerce provides high school students with an opportunity to tackle real business challenges.
